article_node.title: The 4 coolest gadgets I've seen at IFA 2025 (including ones you can actually buy)
article_node.summary: IFA 2025 showcased a range of non‑AI‑centric gadgets that push existing tech further. Philips Hue’s Bridge Pro adds motion‑sensing to legacy smart lights via RF, while Rokid’s AR glasses combine AI assistants with 12‑MP cameras and real‑time translation. Ecovacs’ X11 Omnicyclone robot vacuum offers auto‑emptying and a 6,400 mAh battery, and Ostation 2 provides dual‑type rechargeable battery charging. These innovations highlight a trend toward smarter, more autonomous consumer hardware.
